title: The Best Day (Taylor's Version)
description:
Taylor literally gave her mom Andrea The Best Day when she presented her with this song.. So sweet! This song drums up a lot of emotions for everyone involved. What have Taylor and Andrea said about this song? And can Taylor ever top this gift again?
Amy, Nick, Lacey and Ana break this song down.. and yes, there are some tears.
What did we miss? What song are you excited to hear? Let us know your thoughts!
